ValueDescription.-1: Shows the current event status of comparator 3 (CM3CON[9])
Shows the current event status of comparator 2 (CM2CON[9])
Shows the current event status of comparator 1 (CM1CON[9])

ValueDescription.0: Discontinues operation of all comparatorswhen device enters Idle mode
ValueDescription.1: Continues operation of all enabled comparators in Idle mode

ValueDescription.0: Internal band gap voltage reference is selected
ValueDescription.1: External voltage reference from the CVref+ pin is selected

ValueDescription.-1: Shows the current output of Comparator 3 (CM3CON[8])
Shows the current output of Comparator 2 (CM2CON[8])
Shows the current output of Comparator 1 (CM1CON[8])
